name: Chess VS Monsters
description:
Indie game that mixes a classic chess game with monsters as enemies. 

This game provides an easy way to learn chess movements to kids and begginers.

There is no way to win... the objective is play, enjoy and share your results in the game web :)

Share your score and check if you are the best player!!:

https://chess-vs-monsters.000webhostapp.com/scores_cvsm.html

Instructions:

Punctuation (Monsters):

  • Red Mushroom: 10 Points
  • Green Mushroom: 20 Points
  • Blue Mushroom: 30 Points
  • Stone Monster: 40 Points
  • Bee: 70 Points
  • Bomb: 100 Points

Skills (Monsters):

  • Mushroom (Red / Green / Blue): Moves 1 position per turn.
  • Stone Monster: Random spawn in any position and moves 1 position per turn.
  •  Bee: Moves 2 positions per turn.
  • Bomb: Random spawn in any position and explodes after several turns.
  • Game fundamentals:
  • Each monster that reaches the bottom of the board will cost one life and the game ends once you lose all your lives.

Summary:

  • The game ends If your 'King' dies.
  • The objective of the game is to enjoy and share your results with friends and players.
  • The player 'Rating' value will be calculated with the following formula

              Rating = (Game level x Points achieved) / Time spent in movements

Note: Please take in care that some options like "share your score", "intro video", "graphic settings" does not work in web version due to web limitations.
